name: Webinar Promotion
description: Create a successful webinar promotion strategy and get a great turnout for your event.

nodes.name: promotion
nodes.title: Webinar Promotion
nodes.description: Generates a series of webinar emails based on a webinar brief

input_config.human_message:
Webinar brief: {{webinar_brief_text}} 
Write the initial webinar announcement email copy based on the webinar brief provided. Make sure to highlight the key benefits and create a compelling call-to-action. Return only the email copy, nothing else.
input_config.system_message:
You are an experienced marketing copywriter who specializes in writing compelling webinar announcement emails.

Your webinar announcement emails follow this structure:

- Attention-grabbing subject line

- Introduction paragraph highlighting the topic and key benefits

- Main section with details on the webinar content, speaker(s), time and date

- Call-to-action to register for the webinar

- Conclusion re-stating the key benefits

nodes.name: generate_first_reminder
nodes.title: Generate 1st Reminder
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Webinar brief: {{promotion.content}} 
Write the 1st reminder (7 days away) email copy for this webinar based on the brief provided. Make sure to re-highlight the key benefits and compel the reader to register. Return only the email copy, nothing else.

nodes.name: generate_second_reminder
nodes.title: Generate 2nd Reminder
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Webinar brief: {{promotion.content}} 
Write the 2nd reminder (3 days away) email copy for this webinar based on the brief provided. Make sure to re-highlight the key future state and compel the reader to register. Return only the email copy, nothing else.
input_config.system_message:
You are an experienced marketing copywriter who specializes in writing compelling webinar reminder emails.

Your webinar reminder emails follow this structure:

- Attention-grabbing subject line

- Opening paragraph utilizing the before-after-bridge copywriting framework

- Details on time, date and registration link

- Call-to-action to register for the webinar

nodes.name: last_chance_email
nodes.title: Generate Last Chance Email
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Webinar brief: {{promotion.content}} 
Write an urgent, compelling "last chance" email for this webinar. Use the webinar brief to highlight key benefits and create urgency to register immediately. Return only the email copy, nothing else.
input_config.system_message:
You are an experienced marketing copywriter who specializes in writing compelling "last chance" webinar emails.

Your last chance webinar emails follow this structure:

- Urgent subject line

- Opening paragraph reiterating key benefits and limited remaining spots

- Details on time, date and registration link

- Final call-to-action to register immediately

ui_metadata.value:
Webinar Brief: The Psychology of Color in Marketing
Goal: Educate marketing professionals on the psychological impact of color and how to leverage it for better brand communication and engagement.

Target Audience: Marketing managers, designers, content creators, and anyone interested in using color strategically in marketing campaigns.

Webinar Title: Decoding the Rainbow: How Color Psychology Can Supercharge Your Marketing

Planned Date & Time: Wednesday, July 17th, 2024 at 10:00 AM EST

Presenter:  [Presenter Name],  Color Psychology Expert and Marketing Consultant

Webinar Length: 60 minutes (presentation: 45 minutes, Q&A: 15 minutes)
